actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Risk Management, Research and Specialty Crops
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Risk Management, Research and Specialty Crops.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Risk Management, Research and Specialty Crops

official_title: To provide for grants to assist value-added agricultural businesses.
short_title: Value-Added Development Act for American Agriculture

summary.text: Value-Added Development Act for American Agriculture - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to make grants and provide assistance to eligible applicants to establish Agricultural Innovation Centers to create and enhance value-added agricultural enterprises, markets, and products.Authorizes up to ten initial grants during the demonstration project's first three years, including operation of a Center in: (1) Missouri; (2) Mississippi; (3) Ohio; (4) New Mexico; (5) South Dakota; (6) Texas; and (7) Wisconsin.Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Value-Added Development Act for American Agriculture
To provide for grants to assist value-added agricultural businesses.
